pydra.modules.cameras.workers package¶

pydra.modules.cameras.workers.pike module¶

class pydra.modules.cameras.workers.pike.PikeCamera(*args, **kwargs)[source]¶

Bases: pydra.modules.cameras.workers._base.CameraAcquisition

Class for controlling an AVT camera. Uses the Vimba interface pymba (module documentation here).

cleanup()[source]¶

Called immediately before process terminates.
